Explore the most promising blockchain and Web3 projects to follow in 2023. From decentralized storage solutions like Arweave and Pinata to innovative Layer 1 blockchains such as Internet Computer and Radix, this guide covers a range of technologies shaping the future of the internet. Discover projects in the metaverse, decentralized identity, and other decentralized services that are pushing the boundaries of what’s possible in the digital world.
Layer 1 $ICP Internet Computer: World Computer that provides a complete IT stack on which any online system or web3 service can be built in a fully decentralized form, 100% on-chain. ICP is the only blockchain with smart contracts that serve web experiences, create transactions on other chains, directly integrate with web2 APIs without oracles, and run 20,000x more efficiently. No centralized cloud. Simply powered by breakthrough Chain-key Cryptography.
$XRD Radix: DPOS L1 with SmartContract written with Scrypto langage.
$STX Stacks: SmartContracts and DApps over Bitcoin chain. SmartContract written with Clarity langage (the same used by ALGORAND).
Decentralized Storage $AR Arweave: store documents and applications forever
Pinata IPFS storage
Metaverse $OVR Over: The Future AR Metaverse, NFT Landowner.
Decentralized Identity $UCO rchethic: Decentralized Identity by Uniris
UBI Proof Of Humanity
Ceramic Network no token, serie A Self.ID, ComposeDB, Passport (vote) by 3Box Labs
noox world Proof of Achievements in Your Soul Collect achievement badges as Soulbound NFTs and build your on-chain reputation
sismo The key primitive for web3 identities. Sismo is a modular protocol issuing ZK Badges for reputation portability and aggregation
Unstoppable Domains Own your identity in the digital world. Get started with a Web3 domain.
Other Decentralized Services $PNK kleros: The Justice Protocol Kleros is a decentralized arbitration service for the disputes of the new economy.

It includes links to various services such as privacy enforcement tools, private office suites, secure messaging platforms, and organizations advocating for internet freedom. Each tool is designed to enhance your privacy and security, offering features like encrypted communications, anonymous browsing, and automated removal of personal information from the web.
Internet Freedom internet freedom foundation: Net Neutrality, Censorship and Free Expression, Online Privacy and Encryption
Privacy Tools proton.me: Private office suite: email, drive, calendar, vpn
privacy is sexy: Enforce privacy & security on Windows and macOS
Utopia P2P ecosystem: All-in-one kit for secure instant messaging, encrypted e-mail, anonymous payments and private web browsing.
Simple Login: Anonymous email aliases for login everywhere
Privacytools.io: Provides services, tools and privacy guides to counter global mass surveillance. Established in 2015 after Edward Snowden’s revelations, and is now the most popular privacy website.
Incogni: automatize removal of personal informations over the web

Bitcoin is born in 2008, Ethereum is born in 2013, and their underlying technologies such as blockchain and smart-contracts, are disruptive innovations that make it possible to reinvent services and products that were unimaginable until then.
The Blockchain, by definition decentralized, redefines the notion of trust in exchanges, and allows a fairer distribution of value between individuals. It’s at the heart of the major innovations that will have a strong societal impact in the 21st century.
The Web3 market (sometimes called the crypto market) which is made up of solutions that integrate these technologies has been booming since 2016: Layer1, Layer2 and sidechain, DeFI, NFT, Oracles, Identity, Web3 tooling, DApps, Wallets…. With hundreds of newcomers each week, the market is not slowing down and is reshuffling the cards of the historic web2.0 players.
Larry aims to be a player in the Web3 revolution.
Larry supports entrepreneurs in their Blockchain and Web3 strategy.
